about_the_game:
Welcome to Angry Cubes!


"Angry Cubes" is an exciting puzzle game that will challenge your skills and creativity. In this singleplayer game, each level presents increasing levels of difficulty as you progress through the game.

Tired of everyone being too happy? Your objective is to find a way to make them angry! You'll need to strategically use the surrounding materials to reach everyone without getting killed by thorns. Be careful not to let anyone remain happy, as that's the only way to pass to the next level. Once you complete a level, look for the green squares to progress to the next challenge.

Controls


Movement: W/A/S/D
To Hold Boxes: E
To Drop the Box: F

Get ready to embark on a journey filled with brain-teasing puzzles, unique challenges, and hours of addictive gameplay. Put your puzzle-solving skills to the test in "Angry Cubes" and show off your strategy and creativity in solving each level. Can you make everyone angry? Find out in "Angry Cubes"!
